analyzed: upadiśanti hi vinayam anurūpa pratipatti upapādanena vācā vinā api bhartavyānām svāminaḥ

original: api ca ghiṅmāṃ svadoṣāndhamānasamanādarapīḍitamevamatiguṇavati rājanyanyathā cānyathā ca cintayantam /
analyzed: api ca ghik mām sva doṣa andha mānasam anādara pīḍitam evam ati guṇavati rājani anyathā ca anyathā ca cintayantam
sarvathā tathā karomi

original: yathā yathāvasthitaṃ jānāti māmayaṃ kālena' ityevamavadhārya cāparedyurniṣkramya kaṭakātsuhṛdāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca bhavaneṣu tāvadatiṣṭhat,
analyzed: yathā yathā avasthitam jānāti mām ayam kālena iti evam avadhārya ca aparedyus niṣkramya kaṭakāt suhṛdām bāndhavānām ca bhavaneṣu tāvat atiṣṭhat
yāvat asya svayam eva gṛhīta svabhāvaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ prasādavān abhūt
aviśat ca punar api narapati bhavanam

original: svalpaireva cāhobhiḥ paramaprītena prasādajanmano mānasya premṇo visrambhasya draviṇasya narmaṇaḥ prabhāvasya ca parāṃ koṭimānīyata narendreṇeti
analyzed: su alpaiḥ eva ca ahobhiḥ parama prītena prasāda janmanaḥ mānasya premṇaḥ visrambhasya draviṇasya narmaṇaḥ prabhāvasya ca parām koṭim ānīyata narendreṇa iti

original: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣañcarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dvitīya ucchvāsaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrī mahā kavi bāṇabhaṭṭa kṛte harṣañcarite rājadarśanam nāma dvitīyaḥ ucchvāsaḥ
